snippet: Two car bombings half an hour apart killed 26 people on Monday in a predominantly Kurdish city.
abstract: Islamic State claims responsibility for two car bombings that killed 26 people, including 13 civilians, in Hasaka, Kurdish city in northeastern Syria; group is fighting both Kurdish and Syrian government forces for control of city.
lead_paragraph: Two car bombings half an hour apart killed 26 people on Monday in a predominantly Kurdish city.

headline.main: Syria: Suicide Attacks by Islamic State Target Cadets and a Militia in the North
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Suicide Attacks by Islamic State Target Cadets and a Militia in the North

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
